title: Nekopara
synopsis: The siblings Kashou and Shigure Minazuki enjoy the company of six catgirls. Chocola and Vanilla assist Kashou in his job as a baker at the patisserie La Soleil, while the others—Coconut, Azuki, Cinnamon, and Maple—accompany Shigure in her daily life back at their home.
voices: ['Saeki, Iori', 'Yagi, Yuki', 'Tachibana, Shinnosuke', 'Mizutani, Marin', 'Noguchi, Yuri', 'Itou, Miku', 'Izawa, Shiori', 'Morishima, Yuuka', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Hondo, Kaede']
